content: this pattern is my school project from 2014 after few years i re-wrote the pattern and made some changes here and there you will probably need some knitting experience to finish these socks there s cables and diagonal ribbing so you need to keep focus there s also a 18-sts-wide stockinette panel in front which can be modified to suit your preferences add more cables lace beads or maybe even colorwork to personalize your tabula rasa socks tabula rasa pattern is re-written in january 2019
